page_analysis.text_content:
Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning

Fig 41 Examples of site planning solutions for detached 2nd dwelling units and associated required parking

A Detached & separate from main-
dwelling parking
• Main dwelling has a 1-car attached
  garage.
• 2nd dwelling has a 1-car detached
  garage. (Because it is detached and at
  least 75' from the front lot line, it may be
  located in the rear and side yards.)
• Both dwellings use driveway for their
  uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)

B Attached & separate from main-
dwelling parking
• Main dwelling has 1-car attached garage.
• 2nd dwelling has a 1-car attached
  garage. (Because attached, it must be
  located with the building area rather than
  in the rear or side yards).
• Both dwellings use driveway for their
  uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)

C Detached & combined with
main-dwelling parking
• Both dwellings share a 2-car detached
  garage. (Because it is detached and at
  least 75' from the front lot line, it may be
  located in the rear and side yards.)
• Both dwellings use the driveway for their
  respective uncovered spaces (beyond
  front setbackį

D Combined w/ main-dwelling
parking that is attached to main
dwelling
• Both dwellings share a 2-car attached
  garage.
• Both dwellings use the driveway for their
  respective uncovered spaces (beyond
  front setback)

visual_elements.description: Four comparative site plan diagrams labeled A, B, C, and D, illustrating different configurations for a main dwelling and a detached second dwelling unit on an interior lot. Each diagram shows the placement of the dwellings, garages, driveways, and required setbacks. The diagrams are titled 'Interior lot example' and show 'Front yard', 'Rear yard', and 'Interior-side yard' areas.
visual_elements.location: Middle of the page, arranged horizontally

visual_elements.description: Diagram A: 'Detached & separate from main-dwelling parking'. Shows a main dwelling with a 1-car attached garage at the front of the lot. A detached 2nd dwelling unit (900 sf max) with a 1-car detached garage is in the rear yard. A minimum distance of 12' separates the main dwelling's buildable area from the 2nd dwelling unit. A minimum setback of 3' is shown at the rear lot line.

Diagram B: 'Attached & separate from main-dwelling parking'. Shows a main dwelling with a 1-car attached garage. A detached 2nd dwelling unit (900 sf max) with its own 1-car attached garage is located adjacent to the main dwelling, within the primary buildable area. A minimum distance of 12' separates the two structures.

Diagram C: 'Detached & combined with main-dwelling parking'. Shows a main dwelling at the front of the lot and a detached 2nd dwelling unit (900 sf max) in the rear yard. A separate 2-car detached garage for both dwellings is also located in the rear yard. A minimum distance of 12' separates the main dwelling's buildable area from the 2nd dwelling unit. A minimum setback of 3' is shown at the rear lot line.

Diagram D: 'Combined w/ main-dwelling parking that is attached to main dwelling'. Shows a main dwelling with a 2-car attached garage that serves both dwellings. A detached 2nd dwelling unit (900 sf max) is located in the rear yard. A minimum distance of 12' separates the main dwelling from the 2nd dwelling unit.

A legend at the bottom of the page titled 'Key' explains the symbols used in the diagrams. It includes: a solid line for 'Curb', a thin dashed line for 'Lot line', a grid pattern for 'Sidewalk', a thick dashed outline for 'Required setbacks', a light gray shaded area for 'Dwelling', a dark gray/black shaded area for '2nd-dwelling unit & associated pkg', a white box with a dashed outline for 'Buildable area', a white area with diagonal hatching for 'Area that may not be used to satisfy required parking spaces', and a top-down view of a car for 'Uncovered space'.

technical_specifications.parameter: Minimum distance from front lot line for rear/side yard placement
Maximum size of detached 2nd dwelling unit
Minimum separation between main dwelling and 2nd dwelling unit
Minimum rear setback for 2nd dwelling unit

structural_elements.main_heading: Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning
subheadings: A Detached & separate from main-dwelling parking
B Attached & separate from main-dwelling parking
C Detached & combined with main-dwelling parking
D Combined w/ main-dwelling parking that is attached to main dwelling

additional_notes: The page number '45' is located in the bottom right corner.
The image is a clean, high-quality digital copy with no handwritten annotations or stamps.
In the bullet points for section C, the word 'setback' is followed by a 'į' character, which appears to be a typo in the original document.
